page.title: 18Spencer's Farm Micklebring 2
page.content: {1 Combine Harvester (New Holland),}for cutting the corn.{5 Tractors}which use this other machinery{Muck spreader, {Power harrow, Hedge cutter, Fertilizer {spreader,Corn planter and harrow, Fork {-lift, sprayer for weedkillers, Potato planter.{Other machines; Round bailer {(New Holland), Square bailer {(International), Potato bagger, {Elevator,Corn drier}(Gas Fired) {Auger-Hopper-Grinder}(for cattle feed) There was no electricity on Mr. Spencers farm until the 1950's, Potatoes used to be picked by gangs of women and children but now a machine does the job. An elevator does the lifting with the fork-lift on a tractor. Before joining the{E.E.C.}the farm managed{1 ton of corn per acre. In 1985 the farm is more efficient and now manages{4 tons .}The Spencers have farmed for 150 years in Micklebring.
